title: Claiming Charity
description: Book three in the Debtor's Daughters Series Sometimes it takes more than one man to lay claim to a woman's heart. Charity finds her life turned upside down when she is moved to a cabin and placed under guard. Caught in the web her father created she has three days before she is forced into a marriage she doesn't want. When her guard turns out to be sexy twins she does the only thing she can think of ... plans a seduction. But as they all get to know one another the lines get blurred until it is unsure just who is the seducer and who the seduced. One thing is for sure though, sometimes it takes more than one man to lay claim to a woman's heart. And for Charity this was just the beginning.
author: Lacey Thorn
